description: Fullstack Software Engineer with experience across Web, Mobile and AI development. personalProjects.title: AI Browser Agent Extension
personalProjects.description: AI-powered browser automation with natural language commands and multi-step task execution

projects.name: AI Browser Agent Extension
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered browser automation agent capable of performing web tasks based on natural language commands. Integrated Entropic API for reasoning, task planning, and adaptive agentic behavior. Implemented context memory and execution tracing to handle multi-step actions (e.g., searching, filtering, data extraction). Designed modular architecture for task orchestration and secure API interaction using async Python. Demonstrated real-world automation examples such as email parsing and data-driven web navigation.

personalProjects.title: Voice-Driven 3D Object Generation
personalProjects.description: Real-time 3D object creation in Unreal Engine via voice commands using OpenAI Whisper and GPT

projects.name: Voice-Driven 3D Object Generation
projects.description: Developed a POC enabling real-time creation of 3D interactive objects in Unreal Engine via natural voice commands. Integrated OpenAI Whisper for speech-to-text and GPT-3.5 for JSON-based object generation logic. Implemented dynamic actor spawning in Unreal Engine C++ (e.g., fruits, enemies, traps, bats). Designed a modular architecture with two modes: text input or live voice input for gameplay interaction. Aimed to make speech-driven content creation more accessible by building the system from scratch instead of paid plugins.

personalProjects.title: Food Ordering App
personalProjects.description: In-restaurant ordering app with automatic WhatsApp integration to kitchen

projects.name: Food Ordering App
projects.description: In-restaurant ordering app with auto-sending orders to kitchen via WhatsApp. Platform compatibility for iOS and Android. Includes role-based access control with admins who can add new menu items and manage users, and super admins who can create and configure new restaurants in the system.

personalProjects.title: URL Shortener
personalProjects.description: Full-stack URL shortening service with analytics, link management, and usage tracking

projects.name: URL Shortener
projects.description: Full-stack web application providing URL shortening, link management, and usage tracking. Features include link creation, editing (expiration, naming, max usage), deletion, and redirection. Implemented usage statistics, error handling, notifications, and responsive UI. Additional utilities: copy short link to clipboard, quick access via short codes.

personalProjects.title: IoT Safe System
personalProjects.description: AI-powered secure locker with facial recognition, GPS tracking, and sensor integration

projects.name: IoT Safe System
projects.description: AI-powered secure locker with facial recognition, GPS tracking, and sensor integration. Features a Flutter mobile app for admin control of the Raspberry Pi, including live camera streaming, user management for authorized access, and remote lock/unlock functionality. Admins can create new authorized users, monitor real-time video feeds, and grant access permissions when users request to open the safe.
